description:
Hasekura Rei is a student in her 2nd year at the Lillian Girls` Academy and http://anidb.net/ch1200 [Shimazu Yoshin ]`s grande s≈ìur and cousin. She is shown as very tomboyish on the outside, but is in fact quite gentle despite her appearances.
Rei enjoys reading shoujo novels, sightseeing, cooking, baking and sewing. She obsessively cares about Yoshino and often has to put up with her mood swings.
name: Hasekura Rei
